The Depth & Complexity Framework's Icons in one easy-to-use Chrome Extension!

J Taylor Education and The Center for Depth & Complexity is excited to bring you this versatile tool.  


THE DEPTH & COMPLEXITY FRAMEWORK'S ICONS

Our Icon toolbars have arrived! Quick access for both teachers and students as they implement and input the Icons into Google Documents, Word Processing and more! Different sizes, color, B & W and the Content Imperatives. Drag and drop all our Icons into the files of your choice.

Once downloaded, these Icons may be used for educational purposes only. Reselling them or using them in a product that is sold for profit is not allowed per U.S Copyright laws.


-- HELP TIP -- 
After you download the D&C Icons Chrome Extension, you must click on the puzzle piece icon at the top right of your browser screen located next to your profile Image. Upon clicking the the puzzle piece, a menu will open and you must click on the image of a pin next to the D&C Icons Extension in order to 'pin' the newly downloaded Chrome Extension to your toolbar.
